exportAsDefault.description: Setting this option wraps the typings export in a default property.

secondaryGeneratedTsFolders.description: Additional folders, relative to the project root, where the generated typings should be emitted to.

inferDefaultExportInterfaceNameFromFilen.description: When `exportAsDefault` is true and this option is true, the default export interface name will be inferred from the filename.

exportAsDefaultDocumentationComment.description: When `exportAsDefault` is true, this value is placed in a documentation comment for the exported default interface. Ignored when `exportAsDefault` is false.

stringNamesToIgnore.description: An array of string names to ignore when generating typings.
